channel.title: Wonder & Welcome
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about parenting and following Jesus.
channel.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
channel.itunes:summary: This is a discussion between Seth and Shannon, and sometimes other friends.
channel.description: This is a discussion between Seth and Shannon, and sometimes other friends.

item.title: 1: Encouragers and Squashers
item.itunes:author: Seth Hein, Shannon Hein
item.itunes:subtitle: Wonder & Welcome: 1: Encouragers and Squashers
item.itunes:summary: Seth and Shannon make introductions, explain the meaning behind the name Wonder & Welcome, and share stories of encouraging and squashing wonder and welcome.
item.description: Seth and Shannon make introductions, explain the meaning behind the name Wonder & Welcome, and share stories of encouraging and squashing wonder and welcome. Show Notes Available at http://wonderandwelcome.com/wonder-and-welcome-podcast/2023/episode-001.html.
